Title: Confirm production baseline
Description: Lock target commit hash and migration window

Title: Export Vercel env
Description: Pull production env using Vercel CLI

Title: Build VPS env file
Description: Create sanitized .env.vps.production and verify required keys

Title: Provision Hostinger VPS
Description: Create Ubuntu 24.04 server with SSH keys

Title: Harden OS
Description: Apply updates firewall and fail2ban baseline

Title: Install Docker stack
Description: Install Docker Engine and Docker Compose

Title: Install ffmpeg
Description: Install ffmpeg and ffprobe on worker host

Title: Install Coolify
Description: Install and bootstrap Coolify control panel

Title: Create Neon production project
Description: Prepare pooled and direct connection URLs

Title: Create R2 credentials
Description: Generate media and jav bucket access credentials

Title: Create web service in Coolify
Description: Deploy Next.js app service from Git branch main

Title: Create worker service in Coolify
Description: Deploy transcode worker service from same repo

Title: Set app env vars
Description: Set DB JWT and R2 vars on web service

Title: Set worker env vars
Description: Set DB R2 ffmpeg and TRANSCODE_MODE vars on worker

Title: Run Prisma migrate deploy
Description: Apply schema migrations using direct URL override

Title: Smoke test app API
Description: Validate auth listing and upload endpoints

Title: Smoke test transcode queue
Description: Queue test clip and verify worker completion

Title: Long clip load test
Description: Run at least one long duration transcode test

Title: Prepare DNS cutover
Description: Lower TTL and pre-validate domain mapping

Title: Go-live cutover
Description: Switch DNS from Vercel to VPS endpoint

Title: Post-go-live monitoring
Description: Watch errors queue depth and worker health for 72h

Title: Rollback readiness check
Description: Keep Vercel rollback route ready until stabilization
